name: Stellar Sling
description:
Stellar Sling!

How to play:

- To play you need 2 players and 2 controllers.

- Left analog stick to move, right analog stick to aim.

- Use the shoulder buttons (L1/LB/etc or R1/RB/etc) to shoot gravity bullets.

- If you hit an object (including your opponent) with a gravity bullet that object and the next object you shoot will gain a gravitational pull toward each other.

- If your ship collides with an obstacle (an asteroid or planet) then it will be destroyed and the remaining ship wins!

- Press any button to join once the game has started.

Credits:
